name: The Night of Mike
description:
The Night of Mike is a horror game with exploration elements. You wake up alone in a campus building after falling asleep in class. You must escape the demons that haunt the place and find out what happened.

This game was created using "RPG Maker XP". This game is made for the Chumbaka Game Jam 2019.

Game Designer

Muhammad Fitri bin Amalludin
Darren Abbot ak Manggon

Story by

Muhammad Fitri bin Amalludin

Sound Designer

Nagaindran A/L Kanaseelanayagam

Game Artist

Nur Amirah Binti Zaidi
Muhammad Faiz bin Mohd Najib

Moriaty Johnson "MJ" Character by

Nur Amirah Binti Zaidi

Game programmer

Darren Abbot ak Manggon

Other credits

Song used: Smooth Criminal by Michael Jackson
